mapper.select: select trackNo, (select trackTitle from tbl_track where trackNo = 1) as trackTitle, (select group_concat(courseTitle separator ', ') from tbl_subject where subtype = 1 and trackNo = 1) as trackBasic, (select group_concat(courseTitle separator ', ') from tbl_subject where subtype = 2 and trackNo = 1) as trackApplied, (select group_concat(courseTitle separator ', ') from tbl_subject where subtype = 3 and trackNo = 1) as trackIndustry from tbl_subject where trackNo = 1 GROUP BY trackNo;
